      • UsersDto

        public UsersDto(int id,
                java.lang.String login,
                java.lang.String password,
                java.lang.String ip,
                byte[] salt,
                int essaie,
                long time,
                boolean status)
        this is the constructor of the class with five parameters, id, login, password, ip and the salt
        Parameters:
        id - is an integer who is the id of the UsersDto
        login - is a string who is the login of an UsersDto
        password - is a string who is the password of an UsersDto
        ip - is a string who is the ip of an UsersDto
        salt - is a string who is the salt to salt the password
        essaie - The try number of connection
        time - The time wwhen he tried 3 times to connect
        status - The status of the user. True for connected or false for disconnected
